results.name: Decimal expansion of -(gamma-log(2))/2.
comment: Decimal expansion of the generalized Euler constant -gamma(0,2).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
D. H. Lehmer, Euler constants for arithmetical progressions, Collection of articles in memory of Juriĭ Vladimirovič Linnik. Acta Arith. 27 (1975), 125--142. MR0369233 (51 #5468). See p. 128.
mathematica: Join[{0}, RealDigits[(Log[2] - EulerGamma)/2, 10, 100][[1]]] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Aug 28 2018 *)
